imp.core.model.elements

Class Joint

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.observer.AbstractSubject
      • imp.core.model.Element
        • imp.core.model.elements.Joint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cylinder, Gear, Prism, Revolute, Screw

    public abstract class Joint
extends Element
    Represents a joint in a model.
    Version:
    1.11
    Author:
    biesew

        InvalidParameterException - Thrown if the name is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object otherObject)
        Overrides:
        equals in class Element

      • getAccelerationMatrix

        public abstract PositionMatrix getAccelerationMatrix()
                                              throws NullParameterException,
                                                     InvalidParameterException
        This is the getAccelerationMatrix method. It is responsible for creating the joint's acceleration matrix by multiplying the joint's second derivative matrix by an acceleration value stored in the joint variable.
        Returns:
        The acceleration matrix for the joint.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - Invalid joint variable type passed to second derivative method
        NullParameterException - Null value passed for joint variable type to second derivative

        Get the axis after this joint.

        The Axis after this joint.

        The body before this joint

      • getDerivativeMatrix

        public abstract PositionMatrix getDerivativeMatrix(Joint.JVAR variableType)
                                            throws NullParameterException,
                                                   InvalidParameterException
        This is the getDerivativeMatrix method. It is responsible for creating the joint's derivative matrix by taking the derivative of each position in the phi matrix.
        Parameters:
        variableType - The type of joint variable used in the joint.
        Returns:
        The derivative matrix for the joint.
        Throws:
        NullParameterException - The type of the joint variable was null.
        InvalidParameterException - The type of the joint variable does not match the joint.

      • getJointVariable

        public JointVariable getJointVariable(Joint.JVAR variableType)
        Get the specified joint variable.
        Parameters:
        variableType - The joint variable to get.
        Returns:
        The joint variable.

      • getJointVariablesMap

        public java.util.Map<Joint.JVAR,JointVariable> getJointVariablesMap()
        Get the map of the values for the joint variabls of this particular joint.
        Returns:
        The map of joint variables

      • getJVARs

        public abstract java.util.List<Joint.JVAR> getJVARs()
        Returns a list of JVARs that are valid for this joint.
        Returns:
        A list of applicable JVARs.

      • getPhiMatrix

        public abstract PositionMatrix getPhiMatrix()
        This is the getPhiMatrix method. It is responsible for creating the joint's phi matrix by taking a 4x4 identity matrix and setting the various positions to their proper values.
        Returns:
        The phi matrix for the joint.

      • getQOperator

        public abstract PositionMatrix getQOperator(Joint.JVAR jvar)
        Gets the 4x4 matrix representing the Q operator for the specified joint variable.
        Parameters:
        jvar - The joint variable to get the Q operator for.
        Returns:
        The Q operator matrix.

      • getSecondDerivativeMatrix

        public abstract PositionMatrix getSecondDerivativeMatrix(Joint.JVAR thisType,
                                       Joint.JVAR previousType)
                                                  throws NullParameterException,
                                                         InvalidParameterException
        This is the getSecondDerivativeMatrix method. It is responsible for creating the joint's second derivative matrix by taking the second derivative of each position in the phi matrix.
        Parameters:
        thisType - The type of joint variable used for the joint.
        previousType - the previous type of the derivative.
        Returns:
        The second derivative matrix for the joint.
        Throws:
        NullParameterException - The type of the joint variable was null.
        InvalidParameterException - The type of the joint variable does not match the joint.

      • getVelocityMatrix

        public abstract PositionMatrix getVelocityMatrix()
                                          throws NullParameterException,
                                                 InvalidParameterException
        This is the getVelcoityMatrix method. It is responsible for creating the joint's velocity matrix by multiplying the joint's derivative matrix by a velocity value stored in the joint variable.
        Returns:
        The velocity matrix for the joint.
        Throws:
        NullParameterException - Null joint variable passed to derivative method call.
        InvalidParameterException - Invalid joint variable type passed to derivative method call.
